message: Of course, meeting in Hollywood might be more central for some people, and I figure the more the merrier, and the more interesting and informative...

Who is based in Los Angeles? I sometimes find that the best way to brainstorm using Dramatica is to sit with people and look at a story and a storyform and talk things through. 

Unfortunately, the DUG is too far away for me, so I can't meet with them. I'm essentially near The Grove. Is anyone in the SM, WeHo, Hollywood, Silverlake, etc., area, who would be interested in getting together at some point?
I'm about 11 hours away..... by air!
I hope you have a lot of miles.

Really, can't make it to Burbank?  Do you not have a car?  Because if you do, all you need to do is go up Cahuenga to Barham, go up Barham until it turns into Olive, and before you know it you're in beautiful downtown Burbank and right in front of the Write Bros. office!
Last time Google told me it would take 70 minutes to get there... and they were spot on. That's a hike!
Of course, we'd be thrilled if another group started up in another part of town ... and I for one would be happy to drive out and lend my support if desired!
Granted, traffic's a bitch trying to get across town in 6-7:00 traffic... but we'll try to make it worth your while!  :-}
When are they building the atlantic tunnel?
When enough people insist on coming to the Dramatica Group meetings!  (We may have to get more chairs...)
